00030 /*
00031  * pmap_clnt.c
00032  * Client interface to pmap rpc service.
00033  *
00034  * Copyright (C) 1984, Sun Microsystems, Inc.
00035  */
00036 
00037 #include <unistd.h>
00038 #include "Rpc.h"
00039 #include "Pmap_prot.h"
00040 #include "Pmap_clnt.h"
00041 
00042 static struct timeval timeout = { 5, 0 };
00043 static struct timeval tottimeout = { 60, 0 };
00044 
00045 void Clnt_perror();
00046 
00047 /*
00048  * Set a mapping between program,version and port.
00049  * Calls the pmap service remotely to do the mapping.
00050  */
00051 bool_t Pmap_set( u_long program, u_long version, u_int protocol, u_short port)
00052 {
00053         struct sockaddr_in myaddress;
00054         int sock = -1;
00055         register Client *client;
00056         struct Pmap parms;
00057         bool_t rslt;
00058 
00059         myaddress.sin_addr.s_addr = htonl(INADDR_LOOPBACK);
00060         myaddress.sin_port = htons( 111 );
00061         myaddress.sin_family = htonl( AF_INET ) ;
00062         
00063         client = Clntudp_bufcreate(&myaddress, PMAPPROG, PMAPVERS,
00064                              timeout, &sock, RPCSMALLMSGSIZE, RPCSMALLMSGSIZE);
00065         if (client == (Client *)NULL)
00066                 return (FALSE);
00067         parms.pm_prog = program;
00068         parms.pm_vers = version;
00069         parms.pm_prot = protocol;
00070         parms.pm_port = port;
00071         if (Clnt_call(client, PMAPPROC_SET, Xdr_Pmap, (caddr_t)&parms, Xdr_bool, (caddr_t)&rslt,
00072                 tottimeout) != RPC_SUCCESS) {
00073                 Clnt_perror(client, "Cannot register service");
00074                 return (FALSE);
00075         }
00076         CLNT_DESTROY(client);
00077         if (sock != -1)
00078                 (void)close(sock);
00079         return (rslt);
00080 }
00081 
00082 /*
00083  * Remove the mapping between program,version and port.
00084  * Calls the pmap service remotely to do the un-mapping.
00085  */
00086 bool_t Pmap_unset( u_long program, u_long version )
00087 {
00088         struct sockaddr_in myaddress;
00089         int sock = -1;
00090         register Client *client;
00091         struct Pmap parms;
00092         bool_t rslt;
00093 
00094         myaddress.sin_addr.s_addr = htonl(INADDR_LOOPBACK);
00095         myaddress.sin_port = htons( 111 ) ;
00096         myaddress.sin_family = htonl( AF_INET ) ;
00097         
00098         client = Clntudp_bufcreate(&myaddress, PMAPPROG, PMAPVERS,
00099             timeout, &sock, RPCSMALLMSGSIZE, RPCSMALLMSGSIZE);
00100         if (client == (Client *)NULL)
00101                 return (FALSE);
00102         parms.pm_prog = program;
00103         parms.pm_vers = version;
00104         parms.pm_port = parms.pm_prot = 0;
00105         Clnt_call(client, PMAPPROC_UNSET, Xdr_Pmap, (caddr_t)&parms, Xdr_bool, (caddr_t)&rslt,
00106             tottimeout);
00107         Clnt_destroy(client);
00108         if (sock != -1)
00109                 (void)close(sock);
00110         return (rslt);
00111 }
